text: Hagi kagra vahe zamahenka korana eri neraginka, vahe'mo'zama zamazanteti'ma antre'zama tro'ma hu'naza havi anumzante monora huntenka kagra'a kazeri pehena nehunka kumi hu'nane. E'ina hunka knaka'a eri atupa nehunka, kafu zageka'a eri atupa hu'nane. E'ina hu'negu maka kumapi vahete'ene maka mopafi vahe'mokizmi zamavurera ki'za zokago'za kazeri tro hanuge'za hunte'za kagiza regahaze.
